name: morning-digest
description: Daily morning briefing — email, calendar, weather, and anything notable
prompt:
Good morning. Run a daily digest:

1. Check email for any urgent or important unread messages from the last 12 hours
2. Review calendar for today and tomorrow — list all events with times
3. Check the weather for today (temperature, conditions, rain probability)
4. Check memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md (yesterday) for any pending items or follow-ups

Output a clean summary. Lead with anything urgent, then calendar, then weather. Keep it scannable. If nothing notable, say so briefly — don't pad.
notes: Uses a faster model since this is mostly data retrieval. Adjust schedule to match when your human wakes up.
